metadata.title: Columbia Men's Mountain Tech Half Zip
features: Machine Wash Cold Gentle, Do Not Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, Remove Promptly, Iron Low, Do Not Use Fabric Softener, If Present Do Not Iron Decal, Do Not Dryclean
description: When the greater outdoors has you working up a sweat, this is the shirt you want on your back. Quick-drying polyester jersey fabric offers great moisture management and breathability, resists odor and stays fresh for the long haul. Side seams are offset to minimize contact in high-friction areas.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1 Pounds", "Item model number": "AM6565", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "May 16, 2011"}
